feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 6:53 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: E 28 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
